strategy_reasoning: Visualizing technical updates (audio, UI, bots) through the lens of a cozy 'level up' keeps the tech accessible and friendly. Using the bee mascot with headphones and retro computer setups bridges the gap between complex AI features and our nostalgic, warm brand identity.
visual_style: Cozy 8-bit pixel art, Stardew Valley aesthetic, chunky sprites, soft lighting, lime green (#ecf874) accents

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the main character, a cute pixel art bee mascot with a round chubby yellow body and dark brown horizontal stripes, small black legs, two black antennae, black vertical oval eyes, bright pink rectangular blush marks on cheeks, a small happy smile, and small rounded light blue translucent wings. The bee is wearing chunky pixel headphones and DJing on a turntable made of a large sunflower. Musical notes floating in the air. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic. Text in pixel font: 'AUDIO MODE'. Nostalgic but beautiful.
images.description: Visualizing the massive audio expansion (Music, TTS, Whisper) with the mascot jamming out.

images.prompt: Retro 8-bit pixel art close-up of a vintage CRT monitor glowing in a cozy room. On the screen, a fresh, clean pixelated UI layout with a tiny pixel robot icon waving (representing Polly). The cute chubby bee mascot is sleeping peacefully on top of the warm monitor. Soft pastel mint and peach gradient atmosphere. Lime green (#ecf874) glow effects. Text in pixel font: 'FRESH LOOK'. Warm hug energy, not corporate.
images.description: Showcasing the Frontend redesign and the new Polly Discord bot in a cozy gaming setup.

images.prompt: Pixel art garden scene where digital flowers are blooming rapidly (representing speed/optimizations). The cute chubby bee mascot is zooming through the air leaving a trail of sparkles. A signpost shows a pixel coin with a down arrow (cheaper search). Soft lime green (#ecf874) and warm cream background. Chunky pixels, modern soft lighting. Text in pixel font: 'LEVEL UP'. Wholesome, like A Short Hike.
images.description: Highlighting the optimizations, cheaper search, and faster generation speeds.
